column1: Hi everyone Does anybody have any information regarding the situation in this hotel currently regarding the covid rules We're flying out for a fortnight on September 6And would appreciate any information Restaurant bar pool public areas etcMany thanks Ian

General rules for hotels in Madeira apply. That includes wearing masks on public areas inside. You do not need to wear a mask while seated on an inside restaurant or bar, however if you need to circulate you must put them on. You do not need to wear masks on the hotel outside areas like when sunbathing and swimming.Edited: 12:43 pm, August 14, 2020
Many hotels have their COVID-19 procedures on their website. If not try emailing them to request copy.
